articles.title: The Swedish candy craze has taken Boston by storm. Here’s where you can get it.
articles.description:
After a viral TikTok, Bostonians have become obsessed with sugary Swedish candy.

The post The Swedish candy craze has taken Boston by storm. Here’s where you can get it. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bostonians are increasingly purchasing Swedish candy following a viral TikTok trend.
Local shops report a 50% increase in Swedish candy sales since October 2023.
Residents can find popular brands like Marabou and Bilar at specialty stores across Boston.

articles.title: Few answers as Woburn-based Newpro files for bankruptcy after sudden shutdown
articles.description:
The home improvement company’s abrupt closure last week left employees and customers scrambling.

The post Few answers as Woburn-based Newpro files for bankruptcy after sudden shutdown appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Newpro, a Woburn-based home improvement company, abruptly shut down last week.
The sudden closure left approximately 200 employees without jobs and customers without services.
Local suppliers and contractors face financial uncertainty due to Newpro's bankruptcy filing.

articles.title: Snag 20% off JetBlue flights in December during this limited-time sale
articles.description:
The two-day sale ends Nov. 6.

The post Snag 20% off JetBlue flights in December during this limited-time sale appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: JetBlue offers 20% off flights for December, benefiting Boston travelers.
The two-day sale ends on November 6, 2023.
Boston residents can save on holiday travel plans with this limited-time offer.

articles.title: Watch: Fred Lynn discusses the 2025 Red Sox, rising star Roman Anthony, and more
articles.description:
Former Red Sox centerfielder Fred Lynn appeared on this week's Boston Globe Sports Report.

The post Watch: Fred Lynn discusses the 2025 Red Sox, rising star Roman Anthony, and more appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Fred Lynn discussed the future of the Red Sox on Boston Globe Sports Report.
Lynn highlighted rising star Roman Anthony as a key player for the 2025 season.
Boston fans can expect significant changes to the team dynamics in upcoming seasons.

articles.title: WWII veteran’s remains are being returned to Weymouth
articles.description:
“Private Alfred Langevin’s return reminds us that the passage of time never diminishes the debt of gratitude we owe to those who gave their lives for our freedom."

The post WWII veteran’s remains are being returned to Weymouth appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Private Alfred Langevin's remains are being returned to Weymouth for burial.
Langevin served in WWII and is honored for his sacrifice.
The return highlights the ongoing gratitude for veterans in the Boston area.

articles.title: Embattled Everett mayor loses reelection bid to city councilor
articles.description:
Unofficial results showed Mayor Carlo DeMaria trailing by more than 600 votes after nearly two decades in office.

The post Embattled Everett mayor loses reelection bid to city councilor appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Mayor Carlo DeMaria lost reelection after nearly 20 years in office.
DeMaria trailed by over 600 votes against city councilor.
The election outcome may shift local policies and governance in Everett.

articles.title: ‘The sun is up and we’re fighting’: Bill O’Brien’s fiery response to question about Boston College football
articles.description:
"You show up once a month or something like that, you come in here with these down questions. I'm not down."

The post ‘The sun is up and we’re fighting’: Bill O’Brien’s fiery response to question about Boston College football appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bill O'Brien defends Boston College football amid criticism during a press conference.
O'Brien emphasizes team resilience, stating, 'The sun is up and we’re fighting.'
Local fans may rally behind the team as O'Brien expresses determination.

articles.title: Apparently, Mass. had a ‘gustnado’ touch down Monday night — and more wind is coming
articles.description:
Wind gusts could reach 65 mph overnight on Wednesday with tree damage and power outages expected.

The post Apparently, Mass. had a ‘gustnado’ touch down Monday night — and more wind is coming appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: A gustnado touched down in Massachusetts on Monday night, causing localized damage.
Wind gusts may reach 65 mph overnight on Wednesday, increasing risks for residents.
Tree damage and power outages are expected, affecting Boston neighborhoods.

articles.title: Trio sought in alleged unprovoked Halloween attack at downtown T station
articles.description:
The incident occurred around 11 p.m.

The post Trio sought in alleged unprovoked Halloween attack at downtown T station appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Police seek three suspects in a Halloween attack at Downtown T station.
The incident occurred around 11 p.m. on October 31, 2025.
Increased security measures may be implemented at transit stations for public safety.
